marketNews.title: Realisasi Investasi 2025 Ditargetkan Naik +15,5% YoY
marketNews.content: Minister of Investment, Rosan Roeslani, stated that the government is targeting investment realization of 1,905 trillion rupiah in 2025, an increase of +15.5% YoY compared to the 2024 target. Cumulatively, the government targets total investment realization of 11,855 trillion rupiah in 2025-2029. Here is the breakdown: Rosan claimed that the investment realization target of 1,905 trillion rupiah in 2025 can boost economic growth up to +5.6% YoY. This figure is higher than the government's target of +5.2% YoY and the projection from the International Monetary Fund (IMF) at +5.1% YoY. Rosan mentioned that the sectors becoming the focus for future investment are green investment, connectivity infrastructure, energy transition and downstreaming, and export-based investment. On the other hand, Rosan stated that the limited budget for the Ministry of Investment in 2025 could hinder the achievement of the investment realization target. The budget ceiling for the Ministry of Investment itself decreased by -44.5% YoY to ~681.9 billion rupiah in 2025, only equivalent to 43.4% of the planned budget needs.

marketNews.title: Key Takeaway
marketNews.content: If achieved, the outlook for higher investment realization going forward has the potential to provide a positive catalyst for banking issuers - such as BBCA, BBRI, BMRI, and BBNI - as a proxy for Indonesia's economic growth. Furthermore, the government's focus on developing investment in export-based and downstreaming sectors has the potential to benefit issuers providing downstreaming infrastructure, such as AKRA which owns the JIIPE industrial estate.

marketNews.title: Ketua Badan Anggaran DPR, Said Abdullah, mengatakan bahwa pemerintah dan DPR telah mencapai kesepakatan mengenai asumsi makroekonomi untuk RAPBN 2025
marketNews.content: Chairman of the DPR Budget Committee, Said Abdullah, said that the government and the DPR have reached an agreement regarding the macroeconomic assumptions for the 2025 State Budget Draft (RAPBN). Said mentioned that most of the budget assumptions in the initial proposal submitted by President Joko Widodo on August 16, 2024, have been approved, except for the Rupiah exchange rate against the US Dollar which was revised to strengthen from 16,100 to 16,000, the 10-year tenor SBN yield which was revised down from 7.1% to 7%, and the oil lifting target which was revised up from 600,000 barrels per day to 605,000 barrels per day.

marketNews.title: Institute for Supply Management mencatat bahwa Purchasing Managers' Index (PMI) manufaktur AS naik tipis ke level 47,2 pada Agustus 2024
marketNews.content: The Institute for Supply Management recorded that the US manufacturing Purchasing Managers' Index (PMI) rose slightly to the level of 47.2 in August 2024 (vs. July 2024: 46.8), lower than the consensus expectation which projected 47.5. This result marks the 21st monthly contraction in factory activity in the last 22 months.

marketNews.title: S&P Global mencatat bahwa Purchasing Managers' Index (PMI) manufaktur China naik ke level 50,4 pada Agustus 2024
marketNews.content: S&P Global recorded that the China manufacturing Purchasing Managers' Index (PMI) rose to 50.4 in August 2024 (vs. July 2024: 49.8), exceeding the consensus expectation which projected 50.

marketNews.title: Sekretaris di Ditjen Minerba Kementerian ESDM, Siti Sumilah Rita Susilawati mengatakan bahwa saat ini pemerintah masih melakukan kajian terkait penyesuaian tarif royalti bagi pemegang izin usaha pertambangan khusus (IUPK)
marketNews.content: The Secretary at the Directorate General of Mineral and Coal (Ditjen Minerba) of the Ministry of Energy and Mineral Resources, Siti Sumilah Rita Susilawati, said that the government is currently still conducting a study regarding the adjustment of royalty rates for Special Mining Business License (IUPK) holders. According to the Acting Executive Director of the Indonesian Coal Mining Association, Gita Mahyarani, the current IUPK royalty rate is quite burdensome and far from market conditions. A similar view was conveyed by the Executive Director of the Indonesia Mining Association, Hendra Sinadia, who mentioned that the current applicable royalty rate is quite challenging amid declining coal commodity price trends and increasing operational costs.

marketNews.title: Menteri Ketenagakerjaan, Ida Fauziyah, mengatakan bahwa jumlah pekerja yang terdampak pemutusan hubungan kerja (PHK) per 8M24 mencapai 46.240 orang
marketNews.content: Minister of Manpower, Ida Fauziyah, stated that the number of workers affected by layoffs (PHK) as of 8M24 reached 46,240 people, equivalent to 71.3% of the total layoffs realized during 2023 which reached 64,855 people.

marketNews.title: Pemerintah menambah kuota Fasilitas Likuiditas Pembiayaan Perumahan (FLPP) untuk 2024 dari 166.000 unit rumah menjadi 200.000 unit rumah
marketNews.content: The government increased the quota for the Housing Financing Liquidity Facility (FLPP) for 2024 from 166,000 housing units to 200,000 housing units. This step was taken as the FLPP quota was almost exhausted.

marketNews.title: Bloomberg melaporkan bahwa Departemen Kehakiman AS telah mengirimkan panggilan pengadilan kepada Nvidia Corp. (Nasdaq: NVDA) guna mencari bukti bahwa perusahaan tersebut melanggar undang-undang antimonopoli
marketNews.content: Bloomberg reported that the US Department of Justice has issued a subpoena to Nvidia Corp. (Nasdaq: NVDA) to seek evidence that the company violated antitrust laws. This step was taken after US antitrust authorities became concerned that Nvidia was making it difficult to switch to other suppliers and punishing buyers who did not exclusively use its manufactured artificial intelligence chips. Following this report, Nvidia's stock price fell by -9.53% on Tuesday (3/9).

tickerNews.title: AD Ports Reportedly Cancelled Acquisition of Meratus Group
tickerNews.content: ShippingWatch reported that negotiations between the Meratus group, the parent company of Meratus Jasa Prima, and AD Ports, a port company from Abu Dhabi, ended without agreement. Nevertheless, ShippingWatch mentioned that the Meratus group and AD Ports remain open to the possibility of cooperation. Previously, Bloomberg reported in November 2023 that AD Ports planned to acquire Meratus through a deal valued at 2 billion US dollars.

tickerNews.title: GoTo Gojek Tokopedia will close operations in Vietnam
tickerNews.content: GoTo Gojek Tokopedia announced that the company will close its operations in Vietnam as of September 16, 2024. GOTO stated that this step was taken to emphasize the company's focus. According to GOTO, Vietnam is a highly fragmented market with many players in the transportation and food delivery sectors. GOTO believes this decision will not have a significant impact because the Vietnam business only contributed less than 0.5% of the group's GTV and 2% of the on-demand services business GTV in 2Q24.

tickerNews.title: Bayan Resources and its controller, Bayan Energy, acquired PT Enggang Alam Sawita
tickerNews.content: Bayan Resources along with its controller, Bayan Energy, announced that they have acquired PT Enggang Alam Sawita from PT Berau Utama Berkatsetia for 105.2 billion rupiah. After this transaction, PT Enggang Alam Sawita is 99% owned by BYAN and 1% by Bayan Energy. PT Enggang Alam Sawita is a palm oil plantation company that owns land within and adjacent to BYAN's mining concession. This transaction is intended to support the smoothness of BYAN's operational activities.

tickerNews.title: Avia Avian Director, Ruslan Tanoko, bought 4.2 million AVIA shares
tickerNews.content: Avia Avian Director, Ruslan Tanoko, purchased 4.2 million AVIA shares at an average price of 473.2 rupiah per share on August 29-30, 2024. The total transaction value reached ~2 billion rupiah. After this transaction, Ruslan Tanoko's ownership in AVIA increased from 0.04% to 0.047%.

tickerNews.title: Petrindo Jaya Kreasi signed a MYR 775 billion credit facility from BBNI
tickerNews.content: Petrindo Jaya Kreasi signed a credit facility of 775 billion rupiah from Bank Negara Indonesia (BBNI), with a maturity period up to August 30, 2030. This facility is intended to finance the company's general activities.

tickerNews.title: Buana Finance signed a credit facility of IDR 500 billion from Bank Jago (ARTO)
tickerNews.content: Buana Finance signed a credit facility worth 500 billion rupiah from Bank Jago (ARTO). The facility has a tenor of 3 years and is intended for providing consumer finance credit.

tickerNews.title: Medco Energi Internasional provided a loan facility of IDR 25 billion to its subsidiary, PT Satria Raksa Buminusa
tickerNews.content: Medco Energi Internasional provided a loan facility of 25 billion rupiah to its subsidiary, PT Satria Raksa Buminusa. The loan carries an interest rate of 8.95% per year, with a maturity period until August 31, 2027.
